articles.title: Millie Bobby Brown marries Jake Bongiovi, Jon Bon Jovi tells BBC - BBC.com
articles.description: Jon Bon Jovi tells the BBC his son Jake Bongiovi has married Stranger Things star Millie Bobby Brown.
articles.content:
Rock legend Jon Bon Jovi has confirmed to the BBC his son Jake Bongiovi has married Stranger Things star Millie Bobby Brown.
